original_text: I will put them under the power of King Nebuchadnezzar and his army, who want to kill them. But in later years, people will again live in Egypt, as they did before.’ That is what the Lord says. The Israelites will live in peace I will put them under the power of King Nebuchadnezzar and his army, who want to kill them. korean_text: 내가 그들의 생명을 노리는 자의 손 곧 바벨론의 느부갓네살 왕의 손과 그 종들의 손에 넘기리라 그럴지라도 그 후에는 그 땅이 이전 같이 사람 살 곳이 되리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: I will put them under the power of King Nebuchadnezzar and his army,
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그들을 느부갓네살 왕과 그의 군대의 권세 아래 두겠으며,

sentences.original_text: people will again live in Egypt,
That is what the Lord says.
The Israelites will live in peace
